messages.author: alexeypa (please no reviews)
messages.text: nit: remove the if statement. CHECK will crash the process if the pointer is NULL (in both debug and release build), so the condition in the if statement will never be true.

messages.author: alexeypa (please no reviews)
alexeypa (please no reviews)
messages.text: nit: The type should be ULONG since |returned_bytes| and sizeof() are unsigned.

messages.author: alexeypa (please no reviews)
messages.text: nit: This probably is more readable if it says times->swap(results).

messages.author: Hongbo Min
messages.text:
On 2012/09/13 16:45:48, alexeypa wrote:
> nit: remove the if statement. CHECK will crash the process if the pointer is
> NULL (in both debug and release build), so the condition in the if statement
> will never be true.

Done.

messages.author: Hongbo Min
messages.text:
On 2012/09/13 16:45:48, alexeypa wrote:
> nit: The type should be ULONG since |returned_bytes| and sizeof() are unsigned.

Yes, but because the num_of_processors is int type, so use int to avoid static_cast when comparison.

messages.author: Hongbo Min
messages.text:
On 2012/09/13 16:45:48, alexeypa wrote:
> nit: This probably is more readable if it says times->swap(results).

Done.
